alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the alkyl aryl ether functional group with the generic formula R-O-R' , where R is an alkyl group and R' is an aryl group.
alternative_parents.name: Alkyl aryl ethers

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an heterocycle with at least one oxygen atom linked to a ring carbon.
alternative_parents.name: Oxacyclic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a cyclic ether with three ring atoms(one oxygen and two carbon atoms).
alternative_parents.name: Epoxides

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing the dialkyl ether functional group, with the formula ROR', where R and R' are alkyl groups.
alternative_parents.name: Dialkyl ethers

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Compounds containing a naphthalene moiety, which consists of two fused benzene rings.
class.name: Naphthalenes

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as naphthalenes. These are compounds containing a naphthalene moiety, which consists of two fused benzene rings.

direct_parent.description: Compounds containing a naphthalene moiety, which consists of two fused benzene rings.
direct_parent.name: Naphthalenes

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

superclass.description: Aromatic compounds containing one or more benzene rings.
superclass.name: Benzenoids
